input_descriptions.input_type: A string representing the type of content to generate.
input_descriptions.input_goal: A string representing the main goal of the content generation task.
input_descriptions.input_sub_goal: A string representing the sub-goal of the content generation task.
input_descriptions.input_instruction: An optional string containing any specific instruction to follow during content generation.

output_descriptions.output_data: A string containing the generated content based on the input content type, goals, and instruction.
